summary: ESM and ESP for Vicn Creatures resource
descriptionHtml:
Author: jsnider193
Date:  20 June 2013

Description:  The mods here are made available as a resource for others that want to use the creatures that VICN developed in the came.  Included in each file and the comphrehensive are just the creatures ... Skin/Enc/Leveled List/LChar.   This will allow you to directly place them into a mod that you have (ESM) or one want to start making (ESP or ESM).  This is a resource to help do a mod for those that want these creatures.

Details:  Listed below is the status of what has been done as of the date above:

Mara and IronMaiden Spider:  Complete, combined into 1 ESM/ESP resource mod.
Flesh Spirit: WIP
Flesh Dragon: WIP
DwarvenDroid:WIP
Child of Oblivion: WIP
Consolidated: WIP

Will also be adding some of these to my other mod Critters Running Wild and place them as random encounters into the game itself

Permissions:  VICN for the resource .. thanx much.
author: VICN - jsnider193
